scripts.build:dev: npm run -s lint:strict && echo "[lint] ok" && node scripts/build.js && echo "[build] ok"
scripts.dev: bash -c 'set -e; npm run -s build:dev; HOST=${HOST:-127.0.0.1} npm run -s srv & srv_pid=$!; trap "if [ -n \"$srv_pid\" ]; then kill \"$srv_pid\" 2>/dev/null; fi" EXIT; echo "[dev] watching for changes"; nodemon --quiet --on-change-only --exitcrash --legacy-watch --watch content --watch templates --watch assets --watch config --ignore build --ext md,html,css,js,json,svg --exec "npm run -s build:dev"'
